idea:

All of this, through the right mix of the Latest tech advancements coupled with the Human quality of Empathy, at its heart.

idea: With our close relation and direct connections with the OEM’s, we aim to provide quality products at best price. With our huge warehouse we have stock readily available with us and we strive to achieve maximum customer satisfaction. SHREE PARARMBHA COMPANY provides you with complete solution with magnificent skills, profound knowledge, and infinite range of services. We provide our customers with prompt service support and value addition. We are a leading provider for ONE STOP SHOP for UPS power backup solution ranging from (600 VA to 600 KVA) ,lead acid batteries ranging from 12V – 7 AH to 200 AH SMF Battery & 2V – 100 AH to 5000 AH SMF Battery, Solar Power , EV Solution.The batteries are designed to increase the availability and uptime of mission – critical applications or processes from a simple desktop PC to a large Internet Data Centre.
name: SHREE PRARAMBHA SMARTENERGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Orbital Mekatronik Systems Pvt Ltd, ISO 9001:2015, design and manufacture Safety and Industrial Automation Sensors and Measurement products in India. With experienced R and D, we manuafcture state of the art Make in india international quality products with smart features for Industry 4.0 on automated machines, complying with ESD and EMC norms and specially trained operators.

Our SAFETY LIGHT CURTAINS have Type 2 and Type 4 IEC 61496-1 and 2 certifications, with dual electronics and fail to safe logiic.

Our Smart programmable PICK TO LIGHT SENSORS help manufacturers in the assembly process, boost quality and reduce rejection.
name: ORBITAL MEKATRONIK SYSTEMS PRIVATE LIMITED
